creator: ZIRO Group
descriptionHtml:
News in Bullets is a news aggregator app that chops the clutter from articles online. Save your time by reading daily news updates in short bullets. Download the app today!

It is the world’s #1 news aggregator app in terms of reading speed and providing the flexibility to customize your reading experience.
News in Bullets is a personalized news aggregator app that allows you to filter the news headlines according to the topics you like, from the publications you want. The app gathers the stories that matter to you and saves your time by condensing them into easily digestible bullet points.

• Cutting-edge news reader 🦾
With our community of editors working hand-in-hand with smart technology, News in Bullets literally cuts the edges from top news stories so that a five-minute read is shortened to just a few seconds. This way, you can absorb more information in just half the time you would normally spend in reading full articles.

• Thousand of publications 🗞
Gain access to our collection of news publications ranging from the worldwide names to local and regional outlets. Read news articles from trusted RSS feeds around the globe.

• Hundreds of topics 📝
Read any topics under the sun. You can customize your feed to include topics such as tech, science, sports, breaking news, politics, lifestyle, travel, entertainment, and many more!

• The world in different lenses 📰
You don’t have to rely on just the popular RSS feeds. Just key in the topic that interests you and we will do the rest. Within seconds, you can discover and quickly read through different viewpoints regarding one topic.

• Perfect for multitasking 🎯
Don’t have the time to keep reading? No problem. Our intuitive audio feature will read the top news stories in your feed.

For more information, you can visit our website at newsinbullets.app, talk to us through contact@newsinbullets.app, or follow us on our social media accounts:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/officialnewsinbullets/Twitter: https:// twitter.com/newsinbullets_?s=09
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/newsinbullets_app/
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@newsinbullets
descriptionShort: Top news stories: tech news, entertainment news, local news, world news & more!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
